Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent; local gui = script.Parent.EggGUI local guiEnabled = false local guiOnPlayer = nil local fixedGui = false
enabled = true
-- when activated, either bring gui up or down, depending on current state
function onActivated()
if not enabled then return end
local h = Tool.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if (h ~= nil) then if guiEnabled == false then local p = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Tool.Parent) if(guiOnPlayer == nil) then guiOnPlayer = gui:Clone() guiOnPlayer.Parent = p.PlayerGui end guiEnabled = true guiOnPlayer.GUIFrame.Visible = true Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(-0,-0,1) Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(-0.3,-0.6,0) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(-1,0,0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0,1,0) else Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(-0,-0,1) Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(-0,-0,0) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(1,0,0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0,1,0) guiEnabled = false guiOnPlayer.GUIFrame.Visible = false end end
wait(1)
enabled = true
end
-- remove gui when item is unequipped
function onUnequipped()
if guiEnabled == true then Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(-0,-0,1) Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(-0,-0,0) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(1,0,0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0,1,0) guiEnabled = false guiOnPlayer:remove() guiOnPlayer = nil end
end
function onEquipped()
if fixedGui == false then
local children = gui.GUIFrame:GetChildren() for i = 1 , #children do if i == 17 then print("") elseif children[i] ~= nil then print(i) children[i]:FindFirstChild("Egg Name").Text = GetEggName(i) children[i]:FindFirstChild("Egg Image").Image = "http://www.roblox.com/Game/Tools/ThumbnailAsset.ashx?fmt=png&wd=110&ht=110&aid=" .. tostring(GetEggAssetID(i)) end end fixedGui = true end
end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped) script.Parent.Activated:connect(onActivated)
function updateGUI()
local eggs = game.Workspace:FindFirstChild("eggroot")
-- clear out gui numbers for i = 1, 24 do if i == 17 then print("") else guiOnPlayer.GUIFrame:FindFirstChild(tostring(i)).EggQuantity.Text = "0" end end
if eggs ~= nil then eggs = eggs:getChildren()
-- update gui numbers for i = 1, #eggs do local eggNum = tonumber(eggs[i].Name) updateFrame(eggNum) end end
end
function GetEggName(eggnum) if eggnum == 1 then return "Specular Egg of Red, No Blue" end if eggnum == 2 then return "Chrome Egg of Speeding Bullet" end if eggnum == 3 then return "Agonizingly Ugly Egg of Screensplat" end if eggnum == 4 then return "Unassuming Egg of Shyness" end if eggnum == 5 then return "POW! To the Moon! Egg" end if eggnum == 6 then return "Scenic Egg of the Clouds" end if eggnum == 7 then return "Shiny Gold Egg of Switcheroo" end if eggnum == 8 then return "Egg of Equinox: Day" end if eggnum == 9 then return "Egg of Equinox: Night" end if eggnum == 10 then return "Rusty Egg of Magnetism" end if eggnum == 11 then return "Explosive Egg of Kaboom!" end if eggnum == 12 then return "Radioactive Egg of Zombie Apochalypse" end if eggnum == 13 then return "Vicious Egg of Singularity" end if eggnum == 14 then return "Blue Faberge Egg" end if eggnum == 15 then return "Red Faberge Egg" end if eggnum == 16 then return "Green Faberge Egg" end if eggnum == 18 then return "Fiery Egg of Egg Testing" end if eggnum == 19 then return "Dark Crimson Egg of Nemesis" end if eggnum == 20 then return "Starry Egg of Wild Ride" end if eggnum == 21 then return "Zeno's Egg of Paradox" end if eggnum == 22 then return "Extinct Dino Egg on Ice" end if eggnum == 23 then return "Hot Pink Faberge Egg" end if eggnum == 24 then return "Golden Faberge Egg of Hivemind" end end
function GetEggAssetID(eggnum) if eggnum == 1 then return 24826800 end if eggnum == 2 then return 24826640 end if eggnum == 3 then return 24826811 end if eggnum == 4 then return 24826840 end if eggnum == 5 then return 24826737 end if eggnum == 6 then return 24826725 end if eggnum == 7 then return 24826693 end if eggnum == 8 then return 24826656 end if eggnum == 9 then return 24826683 end if eggnum == 10 then return 24826787 end if eggnum == 11 then return 24826755 end if eggnum == 12 then return 24826704 end if eggnum == 13 then return 24826853 end if eggnum == 14 then return 24830979 end if eggnum == 15 then return 24832618 end if eggnum == 16 then return 24832637 end if eggnum == 18 then return 27345567 end if eggnum == 19 then return 27398610 end if eggnum == 20 then return 31151864 end if eggnum == 21 then return 31157811 end if eggnum == 22 then return 31156903 end if eggnum == 23 then return 31149956 end if eggnum == 24 then return 31149244 end end
function updateFrame(eggNum)
numOfEggs = tonumber(guiOnPlayer.GUIFrame:FindFirstChild(eggNum).EggQuantity.Text) numOfEggs = numOfEggs + 1 guiOnPlayer.GUIFrame:FindFirstChild(eggNum).EggQuantity.Text = tostring(numOfEggs)
end
while true do
if guiEnabled then updateGUI() end wait(2)
end
